metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13977 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: Nagios 4.4.5 allows an attacker, who already has administrative access to change the "URL for JSON CGIs" configuration setting, to modify the Alert Histogram and Trends code via crafted versions of the archivejson.cgi, objectjson.cgi, and statusjson.cgi files. NOTE: this vulnerability has been mistakenly associated with CVE-2020-1408.

criterions.comment: nagios4 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
